Class GameModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • feup.lpoo.reversi.model.GameModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class GameModel
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Stores information about a game session
